Description.Name: Contract for Prometheus Airdrop
Description.Details: Due to your extremely deep pockets, the Dark Mirage research concern is willing to offer you use of their original Prometheus BattleMech, as well as a pilot specially attuned to the needs of the design. Purchasing this contract will permit a one-time airdrop of the original Prometheus when using a BattleMech Airdrop Beacon. After use, the contract is void and the Prometheus can no longer be called in. THIS IS A ONE-USE CONTRACT, IT WILL BECOME UNAVAILABLE AFTER USE! Hold Shift when deploying the airdrop ability to select a specific unit from among those available!
